 def PigLatin(L):
     NgA=['a', 'e', 'o', 'i', 'u']
     dau=['?','!','.']
-    # S=[]
     x=[]
     if L[-1] in dau:
         x=L.pop(-1)
     if L[0].lower() in NgA:
@@ -14,9 +13,9 @@
         S=L[2:]+L[:2]+['ay']+[x]
     else:
         S=L[1:]+L[:1]+['ay']+[x]
     if L[0].isupper():
-        S=S.lower()
+        # S.lower()
         S[0]=S[0].upper()
     return ''.join(S)
 
 print(PigLatin(Input()))
\ No newline at end of file
